title: juniperion
author: juniperion
content: Byte Exchange gives its the users 35% income from referral commissions in 3 levels.You earn 20% from your first-level references, 10% from your second-level references, and 5% from your third-level references.Most of cryptocurrency exchanges will not give you your reward in CASH. They give coupons, comission discounts or other terms.Moreover, these revenues are instantly reflected in your wallet as in CASH, and can be Spent or Withdrawn IMMEDIATELY.You can also earn CONTINUOUS passive income from your referrals paid comissions, not just once.Note: %35 of referral commission is for the first 100.000 users. After that, the ratio of referral income will be change for newcomers.  Â Android Mobile App https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.bytedex.mobile
